column3: Net sales in the U.S. to third parties totaled $8,803, $8,741 and $8,918 in 2018, 2017 and 2016, respectively. No other individual country's net sales exceeds 10 percent of total net sales.

Other (income) and expense, net for 2018 includes income of $12 related to the 2018 Global Restructuring Program, 2017 includes a charge of $24 for the early redemption of debt and 2016 includes income of $11 related to the deconsolidation of our Venezuelan operations.
